page.title: 08Population
page.content: We looked at where people come from and where people go to in Marston Montgomery. These are the questions we asked. 1.What made you move here? 2.Where did you move from? 3.How long have you lived here ? 4.If you move again where will you live? The reasons people had for moving to the village were,because they liked the house and the village,because their relations lived near Marston and they work near Marston.A few people want to move to other parts of Derbyshire.Some people have lived in Marston for 19 years or more.One of us found out that a family were looking for an old house with a large garden in a village.A suitable property was for sale in Marston.They lived in Wrexham before.The've been here 1 yr.
